column2: Unique identifier assigned to each patient. The prefix 'MC180325' represents the hospital registration system followed by a unique number for each individual.
Age of the patient at the time of the recorded visit.
Patient gender as entered during registration. May include casing variations (e.g., Male, male, FEMALE).
Type of insurance coverage or payer source associated with the patient (e.g., Private, Medicare, Medicaid, Uninsured). Includes occasional misspellings to simulate real-world data entry noise.
